sakai:query-template: path:${_mySpace} AND (content:(${q}) OR filename:(${q}) OR tag:(${q}) OR description:(${q}) OR path:(${q}) OR ngram:(${q}) OR edgengram:(${q})) ${_usedin}${_tags}
sakai:title: Files - My files.
sakai:shortDescription: Get the files which the current logged in user has uploaded.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "The querystring to match the file against. This can either be the content of the file, or any property on the filenode."}
{"name" : "sakai:tags", "description" : "A comma seperated list of tags that the file(s) should match"}
{"name" : "usedin", "description" : "Filter files based on where they are used (linked to.) This can be a multivalued parameter."}
{"name" : "sortOn", "description" : "The name of the property you wish to sort on. This only has any affect if it is used with the sortOrder parameter. Default is sakai:filename"}
{"name" : "sortOrder", "description" : "The order you wish to sort in. Either 'ascending' or 'descending'."}
sakai:description: Get the files which the current logged in user has uploaded. These can be further filtered down by adding more parameters
